comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Yes, Elise Wall Ladew (1890–1978) who married William Russell Grace. I wrote the biography that you linked to in Wikipedia. Here is the biography I wrote on her uncle: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Harvey_Ladew,_Sr. And here is the uncle's image. This image prompted me to do the research and write the three articles for Wikipedia: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2477623453/]
